Module de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.icge.simulation
Package de.unistuttgart.informatik.fius.icge.simulation.entity.program

Interface EntityProgramRunner

  • public interface EntityProgramRunner
    A class to run EntityPrograms.
    Author:
    Tim Neumann

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      boolean canRunProgram​(String program)
      Check whether the given program can run.
      boolean canRunProgramOn​(String program, Entity entity)
      Check whether the given program can be run to the given entity.

      Force stop all running entity programs.

    • Method Detail

      • getState

        EntityProgramState getState​(String program)
        Get the state of an entity program.
        Parameters:
        program - The name of program to get the state of; must be a registered program in the EntityProgramRegistry
        Returns:
        The state of the given program
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if the program is not registered in the EntityProgramRegistry
        IllegalArgumentException - if an argument is null

      • canRunProgram

        boolean canRunProgram​(String program)
        Check whether the given program can run.
        Parameters:
        program - The name of program to check; must be a registered program in the EntityProgramRegistry
        Returns:
        true if the program can run
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if the program is not registered in the EntityProgramRegistry
        IllegalArgumentException - if an argument is null

      • canRunProgramOn

        boolean canRunProgramOn​(String program,
                        Entity entity)
        Check whether the given program can be run to the given entity.

        First checks canRunProgram(String) and then EntityProgram.canRunOn(Entity). If the entity was running a program also checks if that program finished succesfully.

        Parameters:
        program - The name of the program to check; must be a registered program in the EntityProgramRegistry
        entity - The entity to check; must not be null
        Returns:
        true if the program can run on that entity
        Throws:
        NoSuchElementException - if the program is not registered in the EntityProgramRegistry
        IllegalArgumentException - if an argument is null

      • run

        void run​(String program,
         Entity entity)
        Run an entity program on an entity.
        Parameters:
        program - The program to run; must be a registered program in the EntityProgramRegistry; must be able to run on the entity now
        entity - The entity to run the program on
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an argument is null
        NoSuchElementException - if the program is not registered in the EntityProgramRegistry
        CannotRunProgramException - if the program is not able to run on the entity now
        RuntimeException - if an exception occurred in the entity program

      • getRunningProgramInfo

        RunningProgramInfo getRunningProgramInfo​(Entity entity)
        Get the running program of a given entity.
        Parameters:
        entity - The entity to run the program on
        Returns:
        the information object for the running program
        Throws:
        IllegalArgumentException - if an argument is null
        NoSuchElementException - if no running program is found for the entity

      • forceStop

        void forceStop()
        Force stop all running entity programs.

        This does not block until successful shutdown
